ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I do, thanks.  In fact I just downloaded EverTools which seems to include an updated version of the EQCharInfo, but my problem is I can t necessarily *get*
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I do, thanks. In fact I just downloaded EverTools which seems to
include an updated version of the EQCharInfo, but my problem is I
can't necessarily *get* everywhere to bug all the vendors. I do
compile what I can from my log, however.

~ L

On Mon, 17 Apr 2000 18:13:55 -0400, you wrote:

>Do you have EQCharinfo.exe program with you ?

-----

>> I'm compiling a listing of zones and the various locations of required
>> elements for any/all trade skills (ie: oven, forge, pottery wheel,
>> shops/merchants to buy supplies, mobs that drop useful items as loot,
>> etc.). Any input, including cities, shops/merchants names, /loc's,
>> websites with info, etc. greatly appreciated.
>>
>> TIA
>>
>> Lori
